actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to establish the Interagency Group on Large-Scale Carbon Management in the National Science and Technology Council and a Federal Carbon Removal Initiative, and for other purposes.
short_title: Carbon Removal, Efficient Agencies, Technology Expertise Act of 2023

summary.text:
Carbon Removal, Efficient Agencies, Technology Expertise Act of 2023 or the CREATE Act of 2023

This bill establishes the Interagency Group on Large-Scale Carbon Management within the National Science and Technology Council to plan and oversee efforts to (1) remove carbon dioxide from the air, ocean, and land; and (2) store such carbon.

The interagency group must develop a strategic plan for federal research, development, and demonstration of technological carbon dioxide removal and storage.

In addition, the interagency group must establish working groups to carry out a Carbon Removal Initiative that pursues such research, development, and demonstration across several federal agencies.

titles.title: Carbon Removal, Efficient Agencies, Technology Expertise Act of 2023
A bill to establish the Interagency Group on Large-Scale Carbon Management in the National Science and Technology Council and a Federal Carbon Removal Initiative, and for other purposes.
